pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalanda­ka­nivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.2: Atha kho devadatto yena kokāliko kaṭa­modaka­tissako khaṇḍadeviyā putto samuddadatto tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.3: upasaṅkamitvā kokālikaṃ kaṭa­modaka­tis­sakaṃ khaṇḍadeviyā puttaṃ samuddadattaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.4: “etha mayaṃ, āvuso, samaṇassa gotamassa saṃghabhedaṃ karissāma cakkabhedan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.7: Kathaṃ mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa saṃghabhedaṃ karissāma cakkabhedan”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.8: “Etha mayaṃ, āvuso, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañca vatthūni yācissāma—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.9: ‘bhagavā, bhante, aneka­pariyā­yena appicchassa santuṭṭhassa sallekhassa dhutassa pāsādikassa apacayassa vīriyā­rambhassa vaṇṇavādī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.10: Imāni, bhante, pañca vatthūni aneka­pariyā­yena appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā sallekhāya dhutatāya pāsādikatāya apacayāya vīriyārambhāya saṃvattanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.13: yo gāmantaṃ osareyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.15: yo nimantanaṃ sādiyeyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.17: yo gahapa­ti­cīva­raṃ sādiyeyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.19: yo channaṃ upagaccheyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.21: yo macchamaṃsaṃ khādeyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyyā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.23: Te mayaṃ imehi pañcahi vatthūhi janaṃ saññāpessāmāti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.1.24: Sakkā kho, āvuso, imehi pañcahi vatthūhi samaṇassa gotamassa saṃghabhedo kātuṃ cakkabhedo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.1: Atha kho devadatto sapariso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho devadatto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.6: Imāni, bhante, pañca vatthūni aneka­pariyā­yena appicchatāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.8: Sādhu, bhante, bhikkhū yāvajīvaṃ āraññikā assu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.9: yo gāmantaṃ osareyya vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.10: yāvajīvaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ na khādeyyuṃ, yo macchamaṃsaṃ khādeyya vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.12: yo icchati āraññiko hotu, yo icchati gāmante viharatu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.13: yo icchati piṇḍapātiko hotu, yo icchati nimantanaṃ sādiyatu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.14: yo icchati paṃsukūliko hotu, yo icchati gahapa­ti­cīva­raṃ sādiyatu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.15: Aṭṭhamāse kho mayā, devadatta, rukkha­mūla­se­nāsa­naṃ anuññātaṃ, tikoṭi­pari­suddhaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.18: “na bhagavā imāni pañca vatthūni anujānātī”ti haṭṭho udaggo sapariso uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.19: Atha kho devadatto sapariso rājagahaṃ pavisitvā pañcahi vatthūhi janaṃ saññāpesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.20: “mayaṃ, āvuso, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañca vatthūni yācimhā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.21: ‘bhagavā, bhante, aneka­pariyā­yena appicchassa santuṭṭhassa sallekhassa dhutassa pāsādikassa apacayassa vīriyā­rambhassa vaṇṇavādī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.22: Imāni, bhante, pañca vatthūni aneka­pariyā­yena appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā sallekhāya dhutatāya pāsādikatāya apacayāya vīriyārambhāya saṃvattanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.23: Sādhu, bhante, bhikkhū yāvajīvaṃ āraññikā assu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.24: yo gāmantaṃ osareyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.26: yo nimantanaṃ sādiyeyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.28: yo gahapa­ti­cīva­raṃ sādiyeyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.30: yo channaṃ upagaccheyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.32: yo macchamaṃsaṃ khādeyya, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyyā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.2.34: Te mayaṃ imehi pañcahi vatthūhi samādāya vattāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.1: Tattha ye te manussā assaddhā appasannā dubbuddhino te evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.3: samaṇo pana gotamo bāhulliko bāhullāya cetetī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.4: Ye pana te manussā saddhā pasannā paṇḍitā byattā buddhimanto te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.5: “kathañhi nāma devadatto bhagavato saṃghabhedāya parakkamissati cakkabhedāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.6: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.10: Atha kho te bhikkhū devadattaṃ aneka­pariyā­yena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.11: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, devadatta, saṃghabhedāya parakkamasi cakkabhedāyā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.14: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, saṃghabhedāya parakkamissasi cakkabhedāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.15: Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.16: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.17: “Yo pana bhikkhu samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkameyya, bheda­na­saṃ­vatta­ni­kaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha tiṭṭheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.18: ‘māyasmā samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkami, bheda­na­saṃ­vatta­ni­kaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.20: Samaggo hi saṃgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.21: Evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ sama­nubhā­si­tabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:1.3.22: Yāvatatiyañce sama­nubhā­si­yamāno taṃ paṭi­nissaj­jeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.9: “kathaṃ ime nānā assu, vinā assu, vaggā assū”ti pakkhaṃ pariyesati, gaṇaṃ bandhati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.24: “māyasmā samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkami, bheda­na­saṃ­vatta­ni­kaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.26: Samaggo hi saṃgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.33: “māyasmā samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkami, bheda­na­saṃ­vatta­ni­kaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.35: Samaggo hi saṃgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.44: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkamati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.46: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.49: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkamati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.51: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.52: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.57: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkamati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.59: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.60: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.62: Samanubhaṭṭho saṃghena itthannāmo bhikkhu tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:2.68: Saṃghādisesaṃ ajjhā­pajjan­tassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippas­sam­bhanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:3.1.1: Dhammakamme dhamma­kamma­saññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃ­ghā­di­sesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:3.1.2: Dhammakamme vematiko na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃ­ghā­di­sesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss10:3.1.3: Dhammakamme adhamma­kamma­saññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃ­ghā­di­sesassa.
